Package org.apache.taverna.server.master.exceptions

This package contains the exceptions/faults thrown by Taverna Server.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadInputPortNameException
    Indicates that the port name was not recognized.
    BadPropertyValueException
    Indicates a bad property value.
    BadStateChangeException
    Exception that is thrown to indicate that the state change requested for a run is impossible.
    FilesystemAccessException
    An exception that happened when the underlying filesystem was accessed.
    GeneralFailureException
    Some sort of exception that occurred which we can't map any other way.
    InvalidCredentialException
    An exception that is thrown to indicate that a credential-descriptor or trust-descriptor supplied as part of a credential or trust management operation is invalid.
    NoCreateException
    Exception that is thrown to indicate that the user is not permitted to create something.
    NoCredentialException
    Exception that indicates the absence of an expected credential.
    NoDestroyException
    Exception that is thrown to indicate that the user is not permitted to destroy something.
    NoDirectoryEntryException
    Indicates that the file or directory name was not recognized.
    NoListenerException
    Exception thrown to indicate that no listener by that name exists, or that some other problem with listeners has occurred.
    NotOwnerException
    An exception thrown when an operation is attempted which only the owner is permitted to do.
    NoUpdateException
    Exception that is thrown to indicate that the user is not permitted to update something.
    OverloadedException
    Exception that is thrown to indicate that the state change requested for a run is currently impossible due to excessive server load.
    UnknownRunException
    Exception thrown to indicate that the handle of the run is unknown (or unacceptable to the current user).

Package org.apache.taverna.server.master.exceptions Description

This package contains the exceptions/faults thrown by Taverna Server.
Author:
Donal Fellows
